rss.channel:
<%- page.blogname %> <link href="<%= page.domain %>"/> <%= page.description %> <atom:link href="<%= page.domain %>/rss.html" rel="self"/> zh-cn <%= updateTime %> wangwenbo.me <% list.forEach(function(post) { %>
<%- post.title %> <%= post.author %> <%= page.domain %>/article/<%= post.routename %>
<%=rssContent(post.content,page.domain,post.routename)%>
<%= post.lastdate %> <%= page.domain %>/article/<%= post.routename %>
<% }) %>
